entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 07:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
